node.phrases: ['I select one record from the list']

node.content-desc: Report export: The Android application chooser now lets you pick the destination application of your choice, like e.g. Google Drive. The limitation to only a few supported applications has been removed.

Report export: The Android application chooser now lets you pick the destination application of your choice, like e.g. Google Drive. The limitation to only a few supported applications has been removed.
Report export: Choose to open the files instead of sending/saving them.

node.content-desc: Bugfix: The rest of the equal split division is now equally distributed among the travelers.

Create Payment
, on payment it opens

when suitable.
